name: The Last Unit
description:
In "The Last Unit" you play two diffrent robots with diffrent skills. Explore a small planet after a rocket crash and find the scientists.



The game was made in Unreal Engine 4.
You can finish it in about 10-15 minutes.

I am a 22 years old game design student from Germany and this is my third real game. It was made within six months.

Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.
 I hope you have fun playing!
